person.persName: John C. Eversole (Perry County, Kentucky, farmer and major (U.S.A.))

body.p: Perry County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Anne Duff Eversole. Father of Sarah Eversole, Elizabeth Eversole, Harrison Eversole, Joseph Eversole, George Eversole, Clarkston Eversole, Mary Eversole, Polly Eversole, and John C. Eversole. Farmer in Perry County in 1850. Farmer in Perry County in 1860. Served in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as major from February 1863 to March 1864. Killed by guerrillas in Estill County on May 2, 1864.
